description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 4 (Details of EVCP), Condition 5 (Details of Cycle Storage), Condition 9 (Landscape Scheme) and Condition 10 (30 year Habitat management Plan) of application reference 36918/APP/2024/3282 dated 31-01-25 (Minor Material Amendment)(S73) to vary of Condition 7 (Second and Third floor use time limitations) of planning permission ref. 36918/APP/2024/2292, dated 18-10-2024 (Change of use of the 2nd and 3rd floor to incorporate Class E(f) children's nursery in addition to the existing Class F.1(f) use as educational and worship space. Formation of third floor outdoor terrace above existing flat roof for use by the nursery (Revised description) to extend use hours for the second and third floors.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
